name: alpenglow blanket
notes:
materials
- 1 of purl soho's [linen quill minis][1] bundle, 50% highland wool, 35% alpaca, and 15% linen. each bundle of this fingering-weight yarn is a total of 4,360 yards/ 1000 grams; approximately 4000 total yards required.
- us 3 (3.25 mm), 32- or 40-inch [circular knitting needles][2]

gauge

27 stitches and 65 rows = 4 inches in stitch pattern

size

finished dimensions: 40 inches wide x 49¼ inches long

designed by purl soho designer, [gaby bush][3].


  [1]: https://www.purlsoho.com/linen-quill-minis.html
  [2]: https://www.purlsoho.com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles.html
  [3]: https://www.purlsoho.com/create/tag/gaby-bush-for-purl-soho/
